name: Delicious Dreamy Pancake Arcade
description:
|| Fun arcade game where you can stack your pancake! Show off your score! ||

Youme-chan just got her new Part-time job as a Pancake Shopkeeper.

She must be able to upgrade her pancake stacking skills to make her shop attractive to people.

+ Can you stack the pancake correctly with no miss? +
Delicious Dreamy Pancake is an arcade game that is very fun to play because you have to achieve the highest score by stacking delicious pancakes and toppings.

+ REACH HIGH SCORES +
Reach the highest score and compare it with your friends by connecting to Google Play Games ~

+ COLORFUL TOPPINGS AND DELICIOUS PANCAKES +
In addition to the excitement of stacking pancakes, the colorful and delicious toppings can also make you hungry!

+ STACK BY ORDER +
Be careful, do not miss every pancake layer and be the pancake stacking master!

+ Features +
- Stack the pancake by order
- Connect to Google Play Games to get Score and Points
- Delicious and Colorful Toppings : Kiwi, Strawberry, Cherry, Usagi Mochi, Pretzel, Whipping Cream, and candies.
- Challenging Levels : from Easy to Hard Mode! Be Prepare!
- Kawaii pixel anime style illustration
- Repeatable game
- Extremely Completely free game to play with no annoying ads
- Delicious Dreamy Pancake is for all ages!

Youme Project is providing you with fun and safe for family game.
